body: There must be something there though. He is imprisoned in the place where the old guy used to be imprisoned by the villagers. Inside, there are still records of his research about women which the boyfriend should've been able to learn from. If the bad guys are leaving him with chance to level up like that, then there should be something more to it. In the end, the warden (who used to be the girl who brings food to him, and ends up getting enslaved) said she wants the boyfriend to enter a cell with her father. A suspicion is, the research includes impregnating women, but the old man told Ayami, the girlfriend, he can't impregnate women, in exchange he can make them feel his pleasure. So it might have something to do with that part.
